Rules

General:

1) This is a game. Play for fun. Don't be rude to other players.

2) Play to win, but also to have fun. See rule 1.

3) I will post in red. No one else is to use red.

4) Do not quote any private communications with me or other players. Failure to adhere to this rule will result in a modkill or a forced-replacement. If you have a question about whether something is acceptable, PM me.

5) You may not talk about this game outside the thread unless your role allows. When a player is killed, with the exception of a modkill, they will be given a link to a “green room.” In this room, you may choose to keep playing and discussing with other deceased players. If you have a partner/partners, do not disclose their name(s). This thread WILL be posted in post game.

6) Do not edit or delete your posts. You WILL be modkilled.

7) Posting in twilight is acceptable, for both the lynchee and all alive players. Feel free to post as much or as little as you want of whatever you like.

8) Once your death scene is posted, you may not talk. No ‘Bah’ post, or someone on your team will be punished for your screw-up.

9) If you fake breaking a rule, it will incur the same punishment as actually breaking the rule.

10) If you believe I have made a small mistake, for example, in a vote count, please point it out in thread. If you have a more serious grievance for some reason, PM me. Leave it out of the thread.

11) My word is final.

13) I reserve the right to add rules if necessary.

Activity:

14) I expect everyone to post every 48 hours (weekends are considered only 24hrs total). Failure to do so will result in an activity prod. I will prod and if there is no post within 24 hours of prod, you will be replaced. More than two prods in the same game day will result in a modkill or a forced replacement, in which I have sole discretion in picking the limit or consequence.

Voting/Deadline:

15) To vote. Please vote in bold as such. vote: playerA. You do not have to unvote to vote again. You may vote for a no lynch. For voting accuracy, I ask that you place your vote at the beginning or the end of your post (this is not mandatory, but it would be appreciated).

16) Deadline will be exactly 12 days from the death scene, every game day.

17) At deadline, majority is cut in half rounded up (D1 deadline lynch would be 7 players / 2 = 3.5 players = 4 to lynch). If there is a tie, the player with the most votes first, will be lynched.

Vanilla Townie Role:
You are a Vanilla Townie. You are a member of the town faction. During the day, you may vote to eliminate a fellow player. You win when the mafia faction is eliminated and at least one member of the town faction is alive.

D1 will start when I receive 6/7 confirmations, or by midnight Monday; whichever comes first

D1 starts now!
